item.description:
Together Singles Dance Westford Ma.

Friday, Nov. 30th. 8 pm. to 1 am.

Westford Regency Hotel

219 Little rd. Westford Ma. Cost: $12. before 9 pm. than it goes up to $15.  THIS EVENT IS POSTED WITH 12 OTHER GROUPS. SO, RSVPS ARE INCORRECT.

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net Dress Code: No blue jeans, No work boots, No sneakers.

Please join Steve Ob1. and friends for an evening of dancing and socializing. As most people already know, this is the largest Singles Dance in New England with 300 to 400 attending. They will be serving Hors d'oeuvres the first hour. This is in a Ballroom, but it is NOT a Ballroom Dance. All you need to do to dance here is just shake it. No special steps or style needed here. The last time we did this location, we had over 45 at our tables and the place was full by 8:30..  So please, get there as close to 8 as possible So, Steve Ob1. can introduce you to as many people as possible. Much after 8:30 pm.. there is no one at our table to introduce you too. Because they are all out dancing.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Steve Ob1. or Meetup at the door as you pay, & the Meetup signs on our tables.
item.name: Together Singles Dance Westford Ma.
